Security Analyst dedicated to the use of the Risk Management Framework RMF NIST800 FISMA OMB and other risk mitigation security techniques to ensure compliance with cyber security for Federal Information and Information Systems Competent in managing and protecting Enterprise Information Systems Network Systems and Operational processes through Information Assurance Controls Compliance Verifications Risk Assessment and Vulnerability Assessment in accordance with NIST FISMA OMB and industry best Security practices Effective leader with innovative businesslevel strategic skills for reaching set goals for organizations Work Experience IT Security Analyst Assessor Deloitte Touche LLP March 2016 to Present Using NIST as a guide I have performed reviews of security documents uploaded by ISSO to confirm they are FISMA compliant and preparation of systems CA RMF AA packages required for systems before they are moved into operation when major changes occur in them or every 3 years This includes making sure that the CA packages remain current and have been reviewed in the last 1 year and the Security Assessment Report SAR and the Authority to Operate ATO are within 3year lifespan I have reviewed and certify that systems POAM have been closed or updates are provided where necessary in the POAM tracking tools to ensure no system weakness remediation milestone is in delayed status since these are the normal causes for FISMA failing grades Once we determined security controls that are applicable to that system then we implement the controls selected by addressing how each control is implemented from the SSP The team and I will conduct the assessment kickoff meeting and interview the ISSO and system owners and create a requirement traceability matrix RTM or test cases to document the assessmentdetermining whether the controls pass or fail using NIST 80053A as a guide When I have used NIST as a guide I am examining policy and procedures for the controls SOPs interviewing ISSOSystem Owners personnel with responsibilities for the controls I am testing and perform test by reviewing screen shotsArtifacts of system configuration in technical security controls adhere to a formal and wellestablished security requirement authorized by NIST SP 80053 Education MS Social in Social Work Virginia Commonwealth University BS in Social
